Reviews.Title: Computer
Reviews.Author: Karen V Neufeld
Reviews.Content: I am amazed by this computer. Big 17.3" screen, resolution is great. Sound is awesome. It was recommended to me by my computer tech. He said it is an excellent computer, especially the price. He set it all up for me.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Lynne Wilson "I will never know enough"
Reviews.Content: There is only one problem with this laptop...Windows 8, it lasted less than 45 minutes before I returned to Windows 7 Ultimate.Now the computer is a joy to use. I have 29 years as an IT tech and I think Windows 8 won't be ready for prime time for at least another year if at all.

Reviews.Title: I hate windows 8!!!!!
Reviews.Author: John D DeGuzman
Reviews.Content: Windows 8 is the AWFUL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  I would not have purchase this if I knew how bad windows 8 is. DO NOT buy anything with windows 8!

ProductInfo.Features:
2.20GHz Intel Pentium B960 Dual-Core Processor
6GB DDR3 Memory / 500GB Hard Drive
Graphics Media Accelerator HD
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Aspire V3-731-B9606G50Makk 17.3" LED Notebook - Intel Pentium B960 2.20 GHz
